# 𓃤 jackal hyena

𒌨𒌨 hero "cultic person" 𓃤

𒌨𒌨 ʷUR.UR jackal <> wolf 𒌨 dog 𒌨𒌨 ʸUR.URᵃ יָרוֹרָא yārōrā jackal 𒌨𒌨 ʸUR אִי doubling

𓋴 𓄜 𓃀 𓃤 सियार siyār-pánthēr “jackal“
𓋴 𓄜 𓃀 𓃤 𒁍𒋢 bu-su “hyena” reverse
𓎛 𓍿 𓏏 𓃤 “hyena” សត្វស្វាន sat سرتلان srtlan sırtlan

𓃥 = jackal fox

𓃤 𓀀||dignitary, senior (in titles)|Shaka
𓃤 𓂋 𓊕 𓀀||senior warden of Nekhen|Shakar

𓎛 𓏏 𓏏 𓃤 | hyena | √hetz ⇔ cat hund (doubling n) hyenᵈa
𓎛 𓍿 𓏏 𓃤 | hyena | khct > کوږ koẓ > √hetz צָבוֹעַ ha.tzavoa
𓎛 𓍿 𓏏 𓃤 | hyena | khctal > көкжал qökjal ⇔ jackal 𓎛 𓍿 𓏏 𓃤 | hyena | √jagt hygeia@Turk hyena

𓎛 𓏏 𓏏 𓃤 | hyena | √hetz <> cat hund (doubling n) hyenᵈa
𓎛 𓍿 𓏏 𓃤 | hyena | khct > کوږ koẓ > √hetz צָבוֹעַ ha.tzavoa +++ 𓎛 𓍿 𓏏 𓃤 | hyena | khctal > көкжал qökjal <> jackal +++ 𓎛 𓍿 𓏏 𓃤 | hyena | √hetz√jagt hygeia@Turk hyezt hye.on chien hyena 𓎛 𓍿 𓏏 𓃤 | hyena | សត្វស្វាន sat svaan hiti √hetz 𓎛 𓍿 𓏏 𓃤 | hyena | (s)hrct <> سرتلان srtlan sırtlan 𓎛 𓍿 𓏏 𓃤 | hyena | <> dhib : wolf Dieb! / jab ⇔ jag jackal Jaguar ⇔ jagt Säbel Jäger / δib ⇔ dig Tiger
